mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE member_id IN( SELECT member_id FROM record_band_music WHERE band_music_id = #{band_music_id} )
SELECT * FROM band_music bm WHERE ( SELECT m.title FROM music m WHERE m.music_id = bm.music_id AND bm.complete = true ) LIKE '%${title}%'

SELECT bm.*, count(*) cnt FROM band_music bm INNER JOIN music m ON bm.music_id = m.music_id INNER JOIN likes l ON bm.band_music_id = l.band_music_id WHERE bm.complete = true AND m.title LIKE '%${title}%' GROUP BY bm.band_music_id ORDER BY cnt DESC
SELECT * FROM band_music bm WHERE ( SELECT b.title FROM band b WHERE b.band_id = bm.band_id AND bm.complete = true ) LIKE '%${title}%'

SELECT bm.*, count(*) cnt FROM band_music bm INNER JOIN music m ON bm.music_id = m.music_id INNER JOIN likes l ON bm.band_music_id = l.band_music_id WHERE bm.complete = true AND bm.title LIKE '%${title}%' GROUP BY bm.band_music_id ORDER BY cnt DESC
